seg-source.mrk: Views

target.mrk: 视图

trans-unit.source: You can save your personalized settings as a view with a unique name.

seg-source.mrk: You can save your personalized settings as a view with a unique name.

target.mrk: 您可将个性化设置另存为具有唯一名称的视图。

seg-source.mrk: Use

target.mrk: 用途

trans-unit.source: When you start the app the first time, the list is displayed according to the default settings delivered by SAP. You can set filters to narrow down the list. You can save your settings as a view with a unique name by choosing the <uicontrol>Select View</uicontrol> button next to the name of the current view to open the view management functions.

seg-source.mrk: When you start the app the first time, the list is displayed according to the default settings delivered by SAP.
You can set filters to narrow down the list.
You can save your settings as a view with a unique name by choosing the <uicontrol>Select View</uicontrol> button next to the name of the current view to open the view management functions.

target.mrk: 首次启动此应用时，会根据 SAP 提供的缺省设置来显示清单。
可以设置过滤器来缩小清单的范围。
通过选择当前视图名称旁的<uicontrol>选择视图</uicontrol>按钮打开视图管理功能，即可将设置另存为具有唯一名称的视图。

trans-unit.source: You can decide to set your view as the new default view. You can also decide to make the view public so that it is available for everyone who has access to the app. If you decide to apply your view automatically, it is applied immediately whenever it is selected. You do not need to click the <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol> button in the filter bar. Be aware that this option might result in long loading times.

seg-source.mrk: You can decide to set your view as the new default view.
You can also decide to make the view public so that it is available for everyone who has access to the app.
If you decide to apply your view automatically, it is applied immediately whenever it is selected.
You do not need to click the <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol> button in the filter bar.
Be aware that this option might result in long loading times.

target.mrk: 您可以决定将您的视图设置为新的缺省视图。
您还可以决定将视图设置为公共，以便所有有权访问该应用的人员都可以使用该视图。
如果决定自动应用视图，则只要选择了视图，它就会立即应用。
无需单击过滤器栏中的<uicontrol>执行</uicontrol>按钮。
请注意，此选项可能导致加载时间过长。

trans-unit.source: You can create a tile for your view. Depending on whether you work with the home page or with spaces and pages, you can select where the tile shall be added. For the home page, you select one or more groups. For spaces and pages, you select one or more pages. First, the tile is added to the <uicontrol>Recently Added Apps</uicontrol> section of this page. You can drag the app to your preferred section.

seg-source.mrk: You can create a tile for your view.
Depending on whether you work with the home page or with spaces and pages, you can select where the tile shall be added.
For the home page, you select one or more groups.
For spaces and pages, you select one or more pages.
First, the tile is added to the <uicontrol>Recently Added Apps</uicontrol> section of this page.
You can drag the app to your preferred section.

target.mrk: 您可以为视图创建磁贴。
根据您是使用主页还是使用空间和页面，可以选择应添加磁贴的位置。
对于主页，选择一个或多个组。
对于空间和页面，选择一个或多个页面。
首先，将磁贴添加到此页面的<uicontrol>最近添加的应用</uicontrol>部分。
您可以将应用拖动到首选部分。

trans-unit.source: The view is saved even if you cancel the creation of the tile.

seg-source.mrk: The view is saved even if you cancel the creation of the tile.

target.mrk: 即使取消创建磁贴，也会保存视图。

trans-unit.source: To view the app without your personalized settings, choose the <uicontrol>Standard</uicontrol> view.

seg-source.mrk: To view the app without your personalized settings, choose the <uicontrol>Standard</uicontrol> view.

target.mrk: 要查看不含个性化设置的应用，请选择<uicontrol>标准</uicontrol>视图。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you change the layout, the system displays a star next to the name.

seg-source.mrk: As soon as you change the layout, the system displays a star next to the name.

target.mrk: 更改布局之后，系统将在名称旁边显示一个星号。
